plot: In Spain, in the 21st century, a woman can be anything she wishes to be: Military ship commander, minister of the government, judge at the Supreme court... or almost anything: she can't yet play football professionally.
title: Cuestión de pelotas
plot_es: In Spain, in the 21st century, a woman can be anything she wishes to be: Military ship commander, minister of the government, judge at the Supreme court... or almost anything: she can't yet play football professionally.
plot_en: In Spain, in the 21st century, a woman can be anything she wishes to be: Military ship commander, minister of the government, judge at the Supreme court... or almost anything: she can't yet play football professionally.
